descriptionHtml:
Dungeons : Realm of Darkness
by Lord Dagobert
May 2013

Adds a brand new dungeon divided in 6 parts with 15 boss encounters. The entrance is situated just under Windhelm\'s bridge,
you should be able to discover the map marker.

The dungeon is available in 2 levels on difficulty, normal and hard. To be able to do the hard mode, you must first
accomplish the dungeon once in normal difficulty and loot the key from the last boss. The normal mode is as difficult as my
previous dungeon mods, while the hard mode is 2x harder.


All the enemies respawn so you can do the dungeon again. The bosses drop special marks (Mark of the Wicked on normal mode and
Mark of Damnation on hard mode) which allow you to craft & improve 4 new armor sets and 16 new weapons.

List of Bosses:


COURTYARD OF SOULS (1 boss fight):
High Cultist Sarethi & Bonelash (1 mark + 1 random item)

RELIQUARY OF THE DEAD (3 boss fight):
Web Keeper (1 mark)
Cinder Atronach (1 mark)
Time-Lost Dremora (1 mark + 1 random item)

ARACHNID QUARTER - Optional (3 boss fight):
Webmancer Nerya (1 mark)
Queen of Webs (1 mark)
The Broodmother (2 marks on normal, 1 on hard mode + 1 random item)

FORGE OF DAMNATION - Optional (2 boss fight):
The Flame Council (High Cultis Drathan, Flameweaver Dureli, Flameweaver Aranth) (2 marks)
Forgemaster Melaran (2 marks on normal,1 mark on hard mode + 1 random item)

NIGHTMARES OF THE PAST (4 boss fight):
Twisted Shade (1 mark)
Queen of Swarm (1 mark)
Volstag, Lord of Eternity (1 mark)
Lord Dagobert (2 marks on normal,1 mark on hard mode + 1 random item)

WICKED LAIR (2 boss fight):
Rhyinn, Destroyer of Realms (1 mark + 1 random item)
The Defiler
(on normal mode: 2 marks of the wicked, 1 mark of damnation, 3 random items, key to hard mode)
(on hard mode: 5 marks of the wicked, 3 marks of damnation, 4 random items)


Total of Marks:
On Normal: 20 Marks of the Wicked + 1 Mark of Damnation
On Hard Mode: 8 marks of the Wicked + 20 Marks of Damnation

Note: There are giant spiders in the arachnid quarter. If you don\'t like them, just skip that part and enjoy the rest
of the dungeon! :)
author: Lord Dagobert
